overview: “La nuit d'avant is the work of a true cultivator of tradition. A seventeen-minute masterpiece that has precisely to do with the act of transmission. I have found a very powerful similarity between the film that is at the origin of this short - The Clock, by Vincente Minnelli-  and Rossellini's Viaggio in Italia. We could continue elaborating and extract a thread from this.  I find it very exciting to be able to start pulling this thread with a film that has been made this year (2019), instead of starting with its birth." - Paulino Viota
tagline: The night. She does not sleep. She calls. She tells. She saw a movie.
title: The Night Before
